website_summaries.verdict: Slightly heavier than regulation pucks, allowing for certain practice drills.
pros: Weighs 7 ounces, which is a bit heavier than a regulation ice hockey puck, making these great for practice sessions to build strength
Vulcanized rubber puck has a long lifespan and good quality

customer_reviews.title: Great Spacers to Raise Couch for Robovac!
customer_reviews.text: Like most (all?) reviewers, I didn't get these to use for hockey. We recently got a robovac (Eufy 12) that has a low profile but still needed about another quarter to half inch to get under our sofa and love seat. Enter the hockey pucks! The feet on our furniture have about a 3.5 inch diameter, and these 3 inch diameter by 1 inch tall pucks work well to raise things. We attached them to the bottom of the feet with some heavy duty double sided carpet tape. Our Eufy now loves going under the sofa and love seat!
customer_reviews.author: bantcher

customer_reviews.title: Every home should have at least four of these.
customer_reviews.text: I inherited an antique dining room set and the table was too low for my modern taller family. When I imagined what I needed to solve the problem, I realized what my mind had invented: hockey pucks. They arrived the day before I hosted a family reunion Labor Day weekend and were a big success. These are real regulation 6 oz rubber pucks, and I’ve already imagined more uses for them in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Alice MacRae

customer_reviews.title: Not a traditional way to use. 1999 Jeep XJ bump stops
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hockey pucks, made in eastern Europe. But I didn't buy em to play hockey. Instead I used them as bump stops on the front axle of my 1999 Jeep XJ with 3" lift kit. Utilized two on each side. Fixed them with epoxy. Works great, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Machine leveler and vibration isolation pucks
customer_reviews.text: After some milling and modification, they turned out to make great adjustable machine leveler/vibration isolation pads. Sorry hockey fans - these pucks had a higher calling. (slap-shot! - Boom, bumper!)
customer_reviews.author: The Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome feet for a compressor
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome product! I use these for the feet of my compressor in my garage. I simply drilled a hole through the center, followed by a counter sinkhole for the head of the bolt. The compressor stays in place and is very quiet
customer_reviews.author: William Vail

customer_reviews.title: I don't play hockey.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use for bump stops on the rear of a lifted 2007 jeep liberty and they worked. These were recommended by the most knowledgeable person on the jeep liberty forum, thanks tom!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use these as pads on my floor jack (should say "pad" since the first one shows no wear) - no modification needed. No slipping,cutting or crumbling and it perfectly fits the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works as a floor protector!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my home theater subwoofer (18in). It works perfectly fine as it holds the spikes up from puncturing my travertine tiles (which are notorious for being soft tile.
customer_reviews.author: Norman D

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for, at a reasonable price. Now I don't play hockey with these, rather, I screw them inside a truck tire to make speed bumps for my rock grinder (grin), but they work fine and last a long time before wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: ajs

customer_reviews.title: Super puck!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest here....I've never held a hockey puck before. Very cool! More so because of where they're from...the Czech Republic!! This thing traveled pretty far just to be used as many others before me, have.....the ever so popular "jacking pad" for a hydraulic lift jack. Perfect! Excellent material structure. Tremendous strength with just the right amount of give to prevent damage to your vehicle. I'm pretty sure it does very well when correctly used for its designed purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good pucks, not made in China, & good for other projects...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make bump-stop pad extensions on '13 Jeep JKU Rubicon. Search "$10 fix for Jeep tire rub" on YouTube to see how to build them. Pucks are made in the Czech Republic, not China!!! Next best thing to America & a HUGE plus in my book!!!
customer_reviews.author: YJosh

customer_reviews.title: What the puck is wrong with you
customer_reviews.text: I use these for opticians work. Saves me from my mini screw drivers slipping into my hand. I'd rather the puck get cut than my fingers. Well made, authentic. If you are questioning if you should get these or not, what the puck is wrong with you? Buy em
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Made in the Czech Republic_seem like good pucks
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be good ones, but I don't know how they compare to others. I used mine to create lift pads for my Tesla Model 3. They worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hart

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: i used these for a different purpose worked well great quality
customer_reviews.author: Rick East Branch ny

customer_reviews.title: Air compressor noise reducers
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and still cheaper than buying 4 rubber 2x2 blocks for under my air compressor legs. Reduces the noise a bunch in the garage so much so that upstairs in the house, you can't even hear the compressor run. These are good and thick.
customer_reviews.author: I,Zolna

customer_reviews.title: Used Them for Making Jack Pads
customer_reviews.text: Used these to make my own jack pads for MB SLK350. Worked well
customer_reviews.author: J. Cox Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Use them for floor jack - should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Zosyn

customer_reviews.title: I don't play hockey
customer_reviews.text: Used to isolate a drum platform, and for that purpose they work super well.
customer_reviews.author: Loki Lokash

customer_reviews.title: Good garage tools
customer_reviews.text: I plan to use these when using my floor jack to keep the jack from damaging the lift points.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered, don't play hockey but ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered, don't play hockey but I used these to extend my spare tire bump stops on my Jeep for my oversized tire.
customer_reviews.author: vance

customer_reviews.title: Great to be used for crafts
customer_reviews.text: I use these to glue on the back of crafts. I drill a hole in them on the side and then stick them on a stake and they are in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Avenue-7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for hacking up your car to not damage your frame.
customer_reviews.author: Some random dude

customer_reviews.title: Worked pefectly
customer_reviews.text: I used these to level my treadmill and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lostcause

customer_reviews.title: They worked great and cost less than half of what the floor ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use on my floor jack. They worked great and cost less than half of what the floor jack pads cost.
customer_reviews.author: vegas

customer_reviews.title: but hockey pucks are just a useful thing to keep around the workshop in general
customer_reviews.text: Not really a sports fan or enthusiast, but hockey pucks are just a useful thing to keep around the workshop in general.
customer_reviews.author: Netpackrat

customer_reviews.title: Yep - pucks
customer_reviews.text: Yep, they're pucks! Very hard. Im using them as "jack pucks".
customer_reviews.author: Ray Sadesky

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Work great for what I needed them for, and there solid rubber.
customer_reviews.author: ErikB

customer_reviews.title: They work great. Very solid but slightly flexible
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make Jack pucks for my Corvette. They work great. Very solid but slightly flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great for fabric weights
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these for fabric weights when I'm cutting out patterns. They are the perfect size, height, and weight.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great engine mounts.
customer_reviews.text: Are you cheap, and need nice stiff engine mounts? Here you go.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great for use with my subwoofer.
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Perfect stands for my Velodyne DD subwoofer. Nice cheap price too. I don't play hockey so I couldn't tell you how it would stand up to the beating. If you are and audiophile and need a solid foundation for your sub/speakers etc this product is great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Snakebitten

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: And I don't play hockey. I'm going to use them for everything from "feet" for the legs of my workshop workbench to a pad on the lift plate of my car jack. Also good on the workbench for propping up workpieces for painting, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality... Good price, correct quantity. Shipment was expedited and recieved quickly. Was just what we expected from when we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna509

customer_reviews.title: Good but missing product
customer_reviews.text: Pucks look good. Only problem is I only received 3. There was suppose to be 4. :-(
customer_reviews.author: travis romine

customer_reviews.title: Used in shop
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it works on ice. Works great under my 80 gallon air compressor to stop the vibrations on my concrete floor. Also have another for my floor jack as a pad.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: great for jack pad DIY
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the sole purpose of making a jack pad. Medium soft/hard rubber. Easy to drill a hole and adding a screw. Only thing is the strong plastic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Bo Li

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find these local. It's like all the major sporting good stores no longer carry plane rubber pucks anymore. Seem to be good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: RatedM3

customer_reviews.title: how can it be bad? Fast delivery and exactly as
customer_reviews.text: It's a hockey puck...how can it be bad? Fast delivery and exactly as expected
customer_reviews.author: J C Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I used it to increase surface area of my motorcycle kickstand and adds grip when on smooth surfaces. great hockey puck!!!
customer_reviews.author: ADaniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not used for hockey.
customer_reviews.text: We used these to make stands and non-skid holders for use in our wood workshop. They work great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: great legit pucks
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the quality of these pucks. they look and feel like solid quality pucks. slide perfectly across ice
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I used these actually to extend the bumpstops on my Jeep, they seam to be fine. Not sure how they'd work for actual hockey, I'd imagine you wouldn't have any trouble, they appear to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Versatile!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are SO useful. I use them as jack stand pads, speaker stand pads, turntable pads. BT speaker holder, spacer to raise my coffee cup closer to the dispenser so it doesn't splash everywhere! So many uses, I think I'm going to buy some for Gifts.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Product matches description and shipped on time
customer_reviews.text: No idea how well they perform on the ice. I am using them to clear a vibratory feeder bowl and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Not a hockey person. I bought these to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a hockey person. I bought these to make leveling feet for a heavy assembly table. They are all consistent in dimensions and material quality. Supplier shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: great pucks
customer_reviews.text: like many other reviewers, my primary purpose for these were to use them on my floor jack. they are great for this purpose!
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: 4 pucks for me
customer_reviews.text: WOW !I ordered 4 hockey pucks and i received 4 hockey pucks. It doesn't get any simpler than that.thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michael gannon

customer_reviews.title: A+ for non hockey applications
customer_reviews.text: Got these to modify as lift pucks for my car. Strong and work well, thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: zx10RRider

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not just for Hockey. We used them as mounts for the fender on a Harley Cycle. Saved some real $$$$. Used to play as a kid and thought it might work and it did.
customer_reviews.author: H KULYK

customer_reviews.title: They're hockey pucks...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hockey pucks. Round and black. I scored the winning goal during the Stanley Cup Finals with one of them. Maybe that was just in my mind though.
customer_reviews.author: MikeJA

customer_reviews.title: I don't play hockey but I imagine these would do ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't play hockey but I imagine these would do the job. I use them in the wood shop since they were cheaper than bench cookies & the same size so you can use the cones or other accessories that fit over them.
customer_reviews.author: tllong2

customer_reviews.title: Believe it or not, we used these pucks to ...
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, we used these pucks to build up the legs of our patio table, so the umbrella holder would match the height requirements. Four pucks to a package. Pucks aren't just for hockey anymore.
customer_reviews.author: David  French

customer_reviews.title: Best thing in the world !
customer_reviews.text: to rest your gun safe on. Its just high enough to get good air flow yet dense enough to withstand 750+lbs of weight.
customer_reviews.author: GR G.

customer_reviews.title: 4 Pack Ice Hockey Pucks.
customer_reviews.text: Thick, quality looking pucks. Will use them to lift my truck with no problems. There is no visible brand except it says Canada Official TSH, but it doesn't matter they look very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Lpz'j

customer_reviews.title: Great BMW Jack Stand Adapters
customer_reviews.text: Love the pucks, they made great BMW Jack stand adapters! A little sawing and dremel work and these pucks were good to go. They probably work great for Hockey as well but I wouldn't know. Quality was great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Toy!
customer_reviews.text: These make great dog chew toys... I haven't tried to play with them for their intended purpose, but my shepherd loves to chew them into bits.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Using them as spacers on my air compressor. Saw ...
customer_reviews.text: Using them as spacers on my air compressor. Saw it on a video and they do work. They get rid of excess noise caused by vibration.
customer_reviews.author: C Sherrow

customer_reviews.title: Great for car jacking (not that kind)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for jacking up my car to perform maintenance & upgrades; they are exactly as advertised and just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I bought for my floor jack
customer_reviews.text: I don't play hockey but, these are perfect for using with my floor jack to lift cars. Very high quality pucks.
customer_reviews.author: Trusted Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Need puck's
customer_reviews.text: I do play hockey so I can't comment on the quality of this product for the game, but it worked wheel for my uses, witch was to raise the sofa and chair tilted one inch , supper fast shipping , price was right , & came as described , thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robert cooper

customer_reviews.title: Used for other reasons
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm using them as body mounts so yeah they're good pucks and even better body mounts 😂
customer_reviews.author: kameron

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I used these pads to make leveling feet for my Bridgeport mill. I am very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for floor jack .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to use it as a Floor Jack pad .. it's really amazing, very hard and stays in place .. i know this review doesn't help at all if you are going to buy this item for it's purpose .. but if you need cheap pads for your Car Floor Jack .. this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Sh_Biker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hockey pucks, plain and simple-what's to say? Decent price, no shipping, delivery on time.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use pucks for top of jack to have a higher range with no damage to vehicle.

customer_reviews.title: Best jackpads on the market today. Period>

customer_reviews.title: THEY Say Canada on them !!! - so you know there honest pucks :)
customer_reviews.text: THEY Say Canada on them !!! - so you know there honest pucks :)

customer_reviews.title: Works great and at a fraction of the cost of of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with the floor jack for my 2000 vette. Works great and at a fraction of the cost of of the custom made pads.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Excellent deal as I use these on my car lift!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great price and value- perfect for the hockey puck lamp I want to make!

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great very solid and durable
customer_reviews.text: Used these to mount my compressor to my concrete floor instead of the overpriced rubber feet. Seems to work great very solid and durable.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Great sofa lifts
customer_reviews.text: These have never seen ice -- I use them to prop up my couch and love seat so that my Roomba can get underneath. These likely also work for hockey.
customer_reviews.author: Moxie

customer_reviews.title: ... lift pads on my C-5 Z06 and they are great. It saved me $110 instead of buying those ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these for lift pads on my C-5 Z06 and they are great. It saved me $110 instead of buying those fancy billet aluminum ones. These also offer the flexibility to be used on any car. Put that in your add and it will open another market other than just Hockey.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to use with a vehicle lift in my auto repair shop.

customer_reviews.title: It's An Official Ice Hockey Puck
customer_reviews.text: Item was an official ice hockey puck. Used it as cushion for floor jack under the car. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are new to solar. This Kit was fairly easy-to-use. It works way better than our old 45w amorphous panel. Definitely would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: I do not use these for hockey, I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not use these for hockey, I use them as pads on top of my floor jack for lifting. They seem to fill the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd E. Anderson

product_meta.title: A&R Sports Ice Hockey Practice Puck, Black - 4 Pack
product_meta.description:
A&R Sports Ice Hockey Practice Puck

The A&R Sports Ice Hockey Practice Puck is a great puck to use on ice. Comes in a pack of 4.
